file_content.text: (Force Sensitive Background) [This device also reacts to your presence in a similar, yet subtly unique, manner.]
[Similarly, this device also seems to turn on as you approach]
(Force Sensitive Background) [As you approach the device, it activates. You can barely sense that this device is somehow responding to your presence.]
[The device seems to turn on as you approach]
[You decide to leave the device alone for now]
